sec.p:
Ru(dmb) (Sullivan et al., 1978), Re (Morimoto et al., 2013), and BIH (Hasegawa et al., 2005; Zhu et al., 2008) were prepared according to the methods reported in the literatures. Ru(pic) was synthesized using a method similar to the synthesis of [Ru(bpy) 2(pic)](PF 6) (bpy = 2,2′-bipyridine) (Norrby et al., 1997; Couchman et al., 1998), except for using dmb instead of bpy. [Ru(dmb) 2(pic)](PF 6) ( Ru(pic)): 1H NMR (acetone- d 6) δ/ppm: 8.81 (d, J = 5.6 Hz, 1H), 8.65 (s, 1H), 8.63 (s, 1H) 8.60 (s, 1H), 8.55 (s, 1H), 8.14 (dd, J = 5.6, 0.8 Hz, 1H), 8.03 (dd, J = 6.4, 2.4 Hz, 1H), 7.94 (d, J = 5.6 Hz, 1H), 7.91 (d, J = 5.6 Hz, 1H), 7.77 (d, J = 5.6 Hz, 1H), 7.70 (dd, J = 5.6, 0.8 Hz, 1H), 7.64 (d, J = 5.6 Hz, 1H), 7.50 (dd, J = 6.4, 2.4 Hz, 1H), 7.43 (dd, J = 5.6, 1.2 Hz, 1H), 7.26 (dd, J = 5.6, 1.2 Hz, 1H), 7.21 (dd, J = 5.6, 1.2 Hz, 1H), 2.67 (s, 3H), 2.58 (s, 3H), 2.55 (s, 3H), 2.49 (s, 3H). ESI-MS (in acetonitrile) m/z: 592 ([M–PF
6
-
] +). Anal. calcd for C 30H 28F 6N 5O 2PRu·H 2O: C, 47.75; H, 4.01; N, 9.28. Found: C, 47.72; H, 3.75; N, 9.40.
